players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

You: "Only 3 of us left and 1 is mafia. Diana died at night. We must be precise. Detective, if you have a result from N1, please share now. Bob and Charlie: where were your heads last night—any reads or plans?"
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Alice, please vote Bob with me to end this now."

Bob: "Charlie is fake-claiming. If he were real, mafia would’ve killed him. He’s pushing an easy mislynch on me without any reasoning. Alice, ask him why he didn’t check you and to explain his N1 logic."

Charlie: "Bob is lying. Mafia didn’t kill me because they knew I could be protected or bait a counter; with 1 mafioso, claiming early is best. I checked Bob as the swingy player. Alice, trust the result and vote Bob."

You: "Charlie, confirm: your exact result text said 'Bob is mafia'? Bob, give a full alternative: if you're town, who’s mafia and why did Diana die? Also, Charlie: why check Bob over me specifically in 1-mafioso setup?"
Bob: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
